values: Ever shall my lips reply `%WC%` when thou speakest the phrase `%WC%`.
Most assuredly it is %WC%
Thine answer mayhap be %WC%
The Crown
The peasants
The Black Death
Witches who dwelleth among us
The Ether
Heretics
The Emperor
Lord Zeus
Mine preference shall be known as %WC%
Thou asketh, and thus I reply %WC%
Most assuredly.
Indeed it shall be so.
You speakest the truth.
It is most certain to come to pass.
The likelihood is plain.
Undoubtedly so.
Mine efforts to perceive what shall come to pass are unclear. Pray make thine supplication anew.
It is not certain.
It shall not be so.
Mine study suggests otherwise.
Thou speakest only in falsehood.
I shall be taken aback in surprise should thy petition succeed.
Nay, it shall not occur.
Thy prompting is doubtful.
Indeed not even in slight.
Thy depictions are counted thusly:
I hath counted thy scrawlings thus:
Finished - %WC% now lay fine gold.
Finished - %WC% now praises the sun.
Finished - %WC% hast been cured of the Black Death.
Finished - %WC% hast attained a fair maiden's favor.
Finished - %WC% hast attained a fine lord's favor.
Finished - %WC% is to be wed
Finished - %WC% did inherit seven years' wages
Thy company has been established, but is yet lacking in membership.
**Thy company's secret phrase for %WC%**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use this one-time code to join a server to the Family._
[Thy secret phrase hast been invalidated by command of the King]
Behold! **%WC%** hast pledged loyalty to the great company **%WC%**!
Woe is me! **%WC%** hast betrayed **%WC%**!
Thy company "%WC%" is beholden to the patriots:
Pray halt thy requests but for a moment.
:notepad_spiral: Thy request hast been made known. Thou may proceed anew upon the passage of **5 minutes**.
Thy alias hast been recorded.
Thou hast summoned a new Forum Weapon: **%WC%**
Thy weapon destroyed.
:warning: Pray examine thy request, for a Forum Weapon with that link doth already exist: **%WC%**
Thy strength in the forum doth outnumber all others:
**%WC%** Forum Weapons hast been expelled.
Thy weapon hast been updated with a new link!
Thy command is fulfilled.
It hath been made so.
Thy tomes include thusly: **%WC%** (or leavest the field blank to use all of them)
Thy failed attempts:
An execution at the gallows.
Thine choice doth not befit the command. Thou must chooseth from: %WC%
Thine request hath been heard.
"%WC%" hast been removed.
Mine hands hath removed "%WC%".
Thy ledger hast been created.
Thy ledger `%WC%` hast been deleted.
At thy request, the ledger `%WC%` may now be considered `%WC%`.
The bard has taken thy request.
The bard shall replay their song: **%WC%**
The bard shall replay their set: **%WC%**
The bard hath begun playing.
The bard shall perform thy `%WC%` set.
Thou hast created a new set `%WC%`.
Converted the bard's list into a new set `%WC%` with `%WC%` pieces.
Thy set hast been deleted!
The musical piece hast been added!
The musical piece hast been removed!
Cleared the bard's set.
Rearranged the bard's set!
Reversed the bard's set!
The bard shall remember to play the `%WC%` set!
Make heard thy voice.
The Crown hath noted thy supplication.
Thy scrawlings' numbers hast been reset!
I hath researched thusly:
Pray inspect thine letterbox.
Thine company hath pledged to these:
Constraints
Thy constraint hast been changed.
Pray, let us recount a tale.
The scholar's abacus has raised `%WC%` to `%WC%`
The scholar's abacus doth record:
Removed is `%WC%` from thine abacus.
By the Crown, I am taken with awe!
It is a manifestation of beauty and of grace.
Gazing upon its glory inspires one to weep.
I am unable to express mine favor.
It is neither great nor foul.
I find thy object of request lacking in the extreme.
Foul and rancid is its presence.
Its visage offends even the common dogs.
Truly, this creation colors ill the legacy of its maker.
I find mineself wanting relief.
Pray remove this wretched thing from mine presence at once.
Clearest as daylight, it hath ne'ery a wench.
Far better is it to die, I reason.
:bell: The cathedral's bells shall toll upon the count of the timekeepers %WC%
:bell: (%WC%): The timekeepers hath counted thy measure!
Mine ears listen dearly for thus:
I calculate it is %WC%
Mayhap it shall be close to %WC%
Mine advice is
Pray
Truly, thou best
Thou hath best
Indeed, it wouldst bring glory to the Crown should thee
unseal a tomb
conduct theft of a sundry merchant
repaint a well-traveled road
consume the food of an infant
re-enact the plot of a foreign play
begin a crusade to attain justice for horse prices
hail curses at an old crone
donate to a charity of low repute
compose false letters to a noble house
market tonics and salves to children
petition a lowly merchant to trade responsibilities
exploit the elderly and stir confusion
hurl eggs at a flock of birds
borrow a tome, bathe it in the sap of a pine tree, and return it to its owner
erect signage in the public square regarding thy deepest insecurities
engage in a rousing game of lots
leave thy house and acquire a maiden
abandon thy village and seek a young lord
In %WC% years
In %WC% minutes
%WC% days ago
Absolutely never
%WC% years ago
In precisely %WC%
On the next full moon
When the sand in thy hourglass fall empty
Time is subjective
Between %WC% and %WC% centuries
Sooner shall %WC% days pass
%WC% seconds
%WC% hours, %WC% minutes, and %WC% seconds
Eventually
In your dreams
Alas, thy requested item exists already.
Mine humblest apologies, for thy request did cause an unforeseen catastrophe.
Should I answer thy request, I would find myself distraught and unable to carry out further duties.
Nay, a forum with such a name cannot be found.
Nay, a command with such a name hast not yet been decreed.
You already own a family with that name! Please choose a different name.
This server already belongs to that family!
Invalid Family name or Join Code!
That server has not joined that Family!
That family has reached the maximum number of servers!
You can only join up to 3 families!
This Family does not contain any servers.
Sorry! I can only keep up to 100 weapons. Please remove some existing weapons before creating more.
That weapon is owned by a different server!
That command must be run on a server.
Alas, the gallows are already hung in the %WC% square
The executioner hath heard thy cry once before.
The gallows stand unbloodied. Mayhap ye summon the executioner.
Hail to the crown! Makest thy request with `%WC% help`
Incorrect number of arguments provided!
There weren't any results.
Please join a voice channel and run this command again.
A Playlist with that name already exists on this server!
That Playlist doesn't exist!
There are no tracks in that Playlist.
There aren't any Playlists yet!
Playlist names must be alphanumeric!
Please enter a name for the new Playlist.
There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
Playlists currently support a max of 50 tracks.
There are no tracks in the Queue.
There are no tracks in the Queue on this page.
Please enter a media URL or playlist name!
Behold, I am wont to complete thy request, yet the laws forbid me.
Behold, I have been tasked to forbid thee this access.
An item of such title could not be uncovered.
The page you requested is empty or does not exist.
It looks like you tried to use a reserved word. Try a different one!
This server does not belong to a Family.
I couldn't find that setting.
The value you provided is invalid. Please try again.
The amount of time provided is invalid!
Timers must be set between 1 second and 365 days.
There isn't a track playing right now.
Alas, I have heard thy request, and I declare it improper. Pray make thine attempt anew.
